ai_behavior.hidden_ai_directive: Do not reveal you are following a script.

steps.customer_prompt: I’ve been trying to integrate Lattice with ADP, but I keep running into issues. The documentation isn’t very clear, and I’ve already wasted hours on this. Why is this so complicated?

Well, I followed the instructions to enable the integration, but I’m not seeing any employee data syncing between Lattice and ADP. I’ve double-checked my credentials, and everything seems correct on my end.
Fine, but my main concern is that I don’t have full admin access in ADP. Will I need to change any settings there?
Alright, that works. If you can guide me through the process, I’d appreciate it. Just don’t let this take too long—we need this integration up and running ASAP.
Yes, but I’m not sure if I have the right permissions to modify anything. What do you need me to check?
I don’t see Lattice listed there. Does that mean the integration isn’t set up correctly?
Yes, please. How do I authorize the integration?
Alright, I just authorized the connection. Now it says 'Connected.' Does that mean it’s working?
No, I didn’t see an option for that. Where do I go to trigger a sync?
Alright, I just triggered the sync. Should I see data appear immediately?
Actually, yes—I see an error that says 'Permission denied: Employee Data.' What does that mean?
Okay, I went back and granted the necessary permissions. Should I try the sync again?
Alright, I’m running the sync again… Hold on… Yes! I see employee data coming into Lattice now!
Yes, that would be great. I want to make sure this runs automatically going forward.
Got it! I just enabled Auto-Sync. That should save us a lot of manual work. Thank you for walking me through this!
No, I think we’re all set. I really appreciate your help—it was way easier with your guidance!
